sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>{{ post.title.rendered }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text> {{ post.content.rendered }} </v-card-text>
    <v-card-action>
      <v-btn @click="deletePost">Delete</v-btn>
      <v-btn>Edit</v-btn>
    </v-card-action>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    post: Object,
  },
  data() {},
  methods: {
    async submit() {
      let res = await PostService.createPost({
        title: this.title,
        content: this.content,
        status: "publish",
      });
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
  created() {
    console.log("creating post", this.post);
  },
};
</script>
